TestCase.name: testNestedProject
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(id=[$0], nestedName=[$1.nested1.name], nestedValue=[$2.value], nestedFlag=[$1.nested2.flag], nestedNum=[$1.nested2.num]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T]])

Calc(select=[id, deepNested.nested1.name AS nestedName, nested.value AS nestedValue, deepNested.nested2.flag AS nestedFlag, deepNested.nested2.num AS nestedNum]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T, project=[id, deepNested, nested]]], fields=[id, deepNested, nested])

TestCase.name: testProcTimeTableSourceOverWindow
TestCase.Resource: LogicalFilter(condition=[>($2, 100)]) +- LogicalProject(id=[$0], name=[$2], valSum=[AS(SUM($1) OVER (PARTITION BY $0 ORDER BY PROCTIME() NULLS FIRST RANGE 7200000 PRECEDING), _UTF-16LE'valSum')]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, procTimeT]])

Calc(select=[id, name, w0$o0 AS valSum], where=[>(w0$o0, 100)]) +- OverAggregate(partitionBy=[id], orderBy=[$3 ASC], window=[ RANG BETWEEN 7200000 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW], select=[id, val, name, $3, SUM(val) AS w0$o0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[id]]) +- Calc(select=[id, val, name, PROCTIME() AS $3]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, procTimeT]], fields=[id, val, name])

TestCase.name: testProjectOnlyRowtime
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(rtime=[$1]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[rtime], watermark=[$1]) +- LogicalProject(id=[$0], rtime=[$1], val=[$2], name=[$3], ptime=[PROCTIME()]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T]])
WatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[rtime], watermark=[rtime]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T, project=[rtime]]], fields=[rtime])

TestCase.name: testRowTimeTableSourceGroupWindow
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(name=[$0], EXPR$0=[$2], EXPR$1=[$1]) +- LogicalWindowAggregate(group=[{3}], EXPR$1=[AVG($2)], window=[TumblingGroupWindow('w, rowtime, 600000)], properties=[EXPR$0]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($2, 100)]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[rowtime], watermark=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, rowTimeT]])

Calc(select=[name, EXPR$0, EXPR$1]) +- GroupWindowAggregate(groupBy=[name], window=[TumblingGroupWindow('w, rowtime, 600000)], properties=[EXPR$0], select=[name, AVG(val) AS EXPR$1, end('w) AS EXPR$0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[name]]) +- Calc(select=[id, rowtime, val, name], where=[>(val, 100)]) +- WatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[rowtime], watermark=[rowtime]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, rowTimeT]], fields=[id, rowtime, val, name])

TestCase.name: testProjectWithoutProctime
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(name=[$3], val=[$2], rtime=[$1], id=[$0]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[rtime], watermark=[$1]) +- LogicalProject(id=[$0], rtime=[$1], val=[$2], name=[$3], ptime=[PROCTIME()]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T]])
WatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[rtime], watermark=[rtime]) +- Calc(select=[name, val, rtime, id]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T]], fields=[id, rtime, val, name])

TestCase.name: testTableSourceWithTimestampRowTimeField
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(rowtime=[$1], id=[$0], name=[$3], val=[$2]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[rowtime], watermark=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, rowTimeT]])

Calc(select=[rowtime, id, name, val]) +- WatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[rowtime], watermark=[rowtime]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, rowTimeT]], fields=[id, rowtime, val, name])

TestCase.name: testProjectWithoutRowtime
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(ptime=[$4], name=[$3], val=[$2], id=[$0]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[rtime], watermark=[$1]) +- LogicalProject(id=[$0], rtime=[$1], val=[$2], name=[$3], ptime=[PROCTIME()]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T]])

Calc(select=[PROCTIME_MATERIALIZE(ptime) AS ptime, name, val, id]) +- WatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[rtime], watermark=[rtime]) +- Calc(select=[id, rtime, val, name, PROCTIME() AS ptime]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T]], fields=[id, rtime, val, name])

TestCase.name: testRowTimeTableSourceGroupWindowWithNotNullRowTimeType
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(name=[$0], EXPR$0=[$2], EXPR$1=[$1]) +- LogicalWindowAggregate(group=[{3}], EXPR$1=[AVG($2)], window=[TumblingGroupWindow('w, rowtime, 600000)], properties=[EXPR$0]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($2, 100)]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[rowtime], watermark=[-($1, 5000:INTERVAL SECOND)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, rowTimeT]])

Calc(select=[name, EXPR$0, EXPR$1]) +- GroupWindowAggregate(groupBy=[name], window=[TumblingGroupWindow('w, rowtime, 600000)], properties=[EXPR$0], select=[name, AVG(val) AS EXPR$1, end('w) AS EXPR$0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[name]]) +- Calc(select=[id, rowtime, val, name], where=[>(val, 100)]) +- WatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[rowtime], watermark=[-(rowtime, 5000:INTERVAL SECOND)]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, rowTimeT]], fields=[id, rowtime, val, name])
